alert.note: Alert for Boone; Bracken; Campbell; Gallatin; Grant; Kenton; Lewis; Mason; Owen; Pendleton; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 30 at 3:14PM EDT until March 30 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR NORTHERN KENTUCKY INTO PARTS OF SOUTHERN AND CENTRAL OHIO... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR NORTHERN KENTUCKY INTO PARTS OF SOUTHERN OHIO... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 063 Fayette OH, Fire Weather Zone 064 Pickaway, Fire Weather Zone 065 Fairfield, Fire Weather Zone 071 Warren, Fire Weather Zone 072 Clinton, Fire Weather Zone 073 Ross, Fire Weather Zone 074 Hocking, Fire Weather Zone 077 Hamilton, Fire Weather Zone 078 Clermont, Fire Weather Zone 079 Brown, Fire Weather Zone 080 Highland, Fire Weather Zone 081 Adams, Fire Weather Zone 082 Pike, Fire Weather Zone 088 Scioto, Fire Weather Zone 090 Gallatin, Fire Weather Zone 091 Boone, Fire Weather Zone 092 Kenton, Fire Weather Zone 093 Campbell, Fire Weather Zone 094 Owen, Fire Weather Zone 095 Grant, Fire Weather Zone 096 Pendleton, Fire Weather Zone 097 Bracken, Fire Weather Zone 098 Robertson, Fire Weather Zone 099 Mason and Fire Weather Zone 100 Lewis. * WINDS...South 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Avoid burning. Conditions are favorable for rapid fire growth.

area.areaDesc: Boone; Bracken; Campbell; Gallatin; Grant; Kenton; Lewis; Mason; Owen; Pendleton; Robertson
